00024 #ifndef _ENDIAN_HPP_
00025 #define _ENDIAN_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "boost/static_assert.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace util {
00033 
00034 
00035 #if defined(__GLIBC__) || defined(__GLIBCXX__)
00036 #define PWIZ_GCC
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 
00040 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00041 #define PWIZ_MSVC
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 
00045 #if (defined(PWIZ_GCC) && defined(__BYTE_ORDER) && __BYTE_ORDER==__LITTLE_ENDIAN) || \
00046     (defined(__MINGW32__)) || \
00047     (defined(__i386__)) || \
00048     (defined(PWIZ_MSVC) && defined(_M_IX86))
00049 #define PWIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 
00053 #if (defined(PWIZ_GCC) && defined(__BYTE_ORDER) && __BYTE_ORDER==__BIG_ENDIAN)
00054 #define PWIZ_BIG_ENDIAN
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 
00058 #if defined(PWIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN) && defined(PWIZ_BIG_ENDIAN)
00059 #error "This isn't happening."
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 
00063 #if !defined(PWIZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN) && !defined(PWIZ_BIG_ENDIAN)
00064 #error "Unsupported platform: probably need a platform-specific define above."
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 
00068 BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(unsigned int) == 4); // 32 bits
00069 BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(unsigned long long) == 8); // 64 bits
00070 
00071 
00072 inline unsigned int endianize32(unsigned int n)
00073 {
00074     return ((n&0xff)<<24) | ((n&0xff00)<<8) | ((n&0xff0000)>>8) | ((n&0xff000000)>>24);
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 inline unsigned long long endianize64(unsigned long long n)
00079 {
00080     return ((n&0x00000000000000ffll)<<56) | 
00081            ((n&0x000000000000ff00ll)<<40) | 
00082            ((n&0x0000000000ff0000ll)<<24) | 
00083            ((n&0x00000000ff000000ll)<<8)  |
00084            ((n&0x000000ff00000000ll)>>8)  | 
00085            ((n&0x0000ff0000000000ll)>>24) |
00086            ((n&0x00ff000000000000ll)>>40) | 
00087            ((n&0xff00000000000000ll)>>56);
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 //
00092 // notes:
00093 //
00094 // To dump gcc's defined macros:
00095 //   gcc -dM -E source.cpp
00096 //
00097 // glibc defines __BYTE_ORDER in <endian.h>
00098 //
00099 
00100 
00101 } // namespace util
00102 } // namespace pwiz 
00103 
00104 
00105 #endif // _ENDIAN_HPP_
